name: Merge Numbers Plus
description:
How to play:
Click on the number to add 1 to it, and Merge Numbers - eliminate it with the same number around it and then plus 1. its so that simple and funny
Match at least 3 same numbers to merge
You can get bonus by merge more for larger numbers and for more points
There is no time limit, so keep playing

Top Features:
- Merge Numbers is very Easy to play & very fun
- Simple but exciting
- Simple graphic, high performance, and smooth effect
- Earn more coins each day and get more awesome rewards via play Merge Numbers!

Enjoy
